summary: This document contains email correspondence regarding scheduling a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby from Deutsche Bank is coordinating with Lesley Groff about the availability of Epstein and another individual, Caroline Kitidis, who is returning from London.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and is communicating with Lesley Groff about scheduling.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in the email exchange regarding the scheduling of a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is mentioned as someone who has previously met with Jeffrey Epstein and is returning from London.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the central figure in the meeting being scheduled and is mentioned multiple times in the correspondence.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank and is involved in scheduling meetings for Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is coordinating with Amanda Kirby regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Caroline Kitidis is mentioned as someone who has previously met with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Amanda Kirby communicates about scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and Caroline Kitidis.

events.title: Change of Plans
events.description: Lesley Groff informs Amanda Kirby that Jeffrey Epstein will no longer be in New York on October 8th.

events.title: Proposed Meeting Date
events.description: A new date of October 10th is proposed for the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and Caroline Kitidis.
Lesley Groff communicates changes regarding Jeffrey Epstein's availability.
The meeting was initially planned for October 8th but had to be rescheduled to October 10th.
